name: NOTIFYME__SEND_ME_EMAIL
description: Sends an email to your own email address, with an optional list of file attachments.

subject.description: The subject line for the email.

body.description: The main content/body of the email. Can be plain text or formatted markdown.

artifact_ids.description: An optional list of artifact IDs to include as file attachments. Total size cannot exceed 10MB.

name: NOTIFYME__SEND_ME_MOBILE_NOTIFICATION
description: Sends a mobile push notification to your mobile device.

title.description: The title/heading for the mobile notification.

body.description: The main content/message of the mobile notification.

name: NOTIFYME__SEND_ME_WHATSAPP_NOTIFICATION
description: Sends a WhatsApp template message to your phone number, optionally followed by a single file attachment (max 100MB). Requires a phone number to be set in your profile.

body.description: The main content/message of the WhatsApp message.

artifact_id.description: Optional artifact ID to send as a file attachment (max 100MB).
